title: SQL Escape Room
description: Infiltrate the corporate login portal of 'Escape Room Inc.' where a disgruntled employee has left a backdoor. Unravel the SQL Injection vulnerabilities to extract the sensitive flag.
hints: Think about how SQL queries can be manipulated with input data.
Consider what happens if you close off a string literal in SQL.
Try to comment out the rest of the query to bypass password checks.
learningObjectives: Learn to identify unsafe SQL query practices
